5801 //0101100000000001->LDR A 00000001
5900 //0101100100000000 LDR B 00000000
1220 // ADD C A B 00010 010 001 000 00 
7007 //JMP 0111000000000111 (5900 instr on 7th linw)
9800 //1001100000000000 ->HALT
6A80   //LDI 640->0110101010000000
9800 //1001100000000000 ->HALT
8005//JNZ 1000000000000101
6002 //STR A 00000010->01100000000000010
9800 //1001100000000000 ->HALT
2220 //SUB CAB 00100 010 001 000 00
0
0
A20  //0000101000100000->MOV REGADDR B A
0
0
5801 //0101100000000001->LDR A 00000001
2244 //SUB C C B  00100 010 010 001 00
0
//01110 000 00000000 JMP
